column5: Anybody else getting tired of this rain?  Was supposed to head out tomorrow, but there's supposed to be a downpour again this evening, surely ruining the creeks for tomorrow.  Everytime I can find a gap between work and school, rain ruins my plans.  I'm getting frustrated lol.  Hopefully things clean up by Sunday...
tell me about it!! tomorrow is my only day off this week and rain.  i haven't touched my pin for 2 weeks...i think i forgot how to cast already
THIS RAIN SHOULD FLUSH A TON BACK OUT TO THE LAKE. BETTER START GREASING UP THE BASS GEAR AND HIT SOME CRAPPIE. THATS WHAT I THINK I'LL DO THIS WEEKEND. SEE YA STEELIES IN THE FALL  LOL

i was at bowmanville and oshawa today, water was very clear and we could see lots of trout suspended just under the surface in the lower streches, managed 3 between me and my buddy. will give it last shot on sunday.
